Item.Item: Olympus µ[MJU:] TOUGH-8010 14 MP Digital Camera (Platinum silver)
Olympus µ[MJU:] TOUGH-8010 14 MP Digital Camera (Platinum silver)
Item.ReviewTitle: Great for watersports and outdoor activities
Item.Review:
Pros: Durability in outdoor environments, HD video, macro features
Cons: Shorrt battery life, autofocus issues in certain conditions, indoor performance lacking, learning curve
I purchased this camera mainly to be used while sea kayaking, from short day paddles to extended trips. In that capacity, it works great, especially the video. I mounted the camera on my kayak and the high definition video turns out awesome! Camera takes a beating from waves and no water problems. Extremely convenient to be able to have a camera accessable while out on the water. Was on an extended trip and brought 3 batteries and solar charger/external power pack. Worked great. Took over 550 pictures and 2 hours+ HD video. Used a 16gig external memory chip (see discussion below). Battery life is bi ... g issue. Suggest buying an extra battery (or two), if you're going to take lots of pictures/video. Take Note! Using the camera can be a bit tricky: there is a learning curve. This is not a beginner's point and shoot camera in my opinion. There are many features and settings that I "haven't been able to get to work so well". I have more sucess using the manual mode and changing the settings myself rather than using the automatic settings. At this point, many of the "features" I can do without. Time will tell though. The autofocus has issues in indoor settings, especially with busy backgrounds and in lower light. Macro features are supurb! A shortcoming that is easily solved: In order to charge the battery 1) you have to use the camera to charge the battery (no external charger provided) 2) the camera is "exposed" to the elements and in a awkward position when using the camera to charge the battery. Solution is to purchase an external charger. Best Buy had combo pack with external charger and battery. For higher performance and durability pertaining to memory, purchase a memory card with a high transfer rate. If you plan on being away from a computer for an extended period, purchase a large size memory chip, especially for HD video. 30 min = several gigs. There are memory chips available with different durability ratings. What I found, the more durable, the higher transfer ... expand » « collapse
Item.HelpfulCount: 1 out of 1 found this review helpful.

Item.Item: Olympus µ[MJU:] TOUGH-8010 14 MP Digital Camera (Platinum silver)
Item.Review:
Pros: Small / Compact; Easy to Use; Fast Shutter Speed; Large Clear LCD; Good in Low Light; Great Resolution; Great Zoom
Cons: Short Battery Life; Lag / Shutter Delay
Since it was a real different camera to use I had some difficulty in working on it, yes, due to being a "novice" -- it takes time to get used to all this technology involved in this fine camera! I bought bigger batteries to last longer and a 16 gb memory card so I can capture so many pictures and videos! It can adapt to any environment. I now carry it in my pocket and had to wait a few seconds to have the power on and ready! Menu listing readily available on display!

Love This camera! I'd give it a A+++++++++++++++ THANKS! I jumped off huge 20-40ft cliffs with it and it still is workin. swam forever with it to.
Item.HelpfulCount: 1 out of 1 found this review helpful.

Item.Item: Olympus µ[MJU:] TOUGH-8010 14 MP Digital Camera (Platinum silver)
Item.Review:
Pros: waterproof, durable build, great quality pictures and video, easy to use.
Cons: not as slim as other point and shoots on the market, battery life, shutter speed
I bought this camera for a trip to Florida, but more specifically because at some point we were going on a manatee tour. The camera is a must for water sports. It was very easy to set up & the pictures are incredible. The menu & setting are easy enough to navigate, but there are still some shooting modes that I have yet to try out. The shutter speed is noticeably slower than the previous point and shoot I had, but it's a minor problem. I had read about the slow speed in others reviews, but was willing to take a chance for underwater pictures. I didn't care for taking my SLR on a pontoon boat where soakin ... g wet people would be climbing in and out all day. The pictures were pretty clear considering the amount of people that were there & the amount of silt they were kicking up. The 14 megapixels allow you to blow up the pictures a considerable size before getting grainy, and the video recording is also excellent. The camera was in the water for half a day, and I had zero problems with it. I bumped the camera several times getting in and out of the boat, and it took it like a champ. I cringed the first couple of times, but there is hardly a scratch on it. I also took it on a quick day trip to the beach. Of coarse it was dropped in the sand, and it was the dry powdery sand that gets everywhere,but a quick dip in the water and all the sand was gone. The battery life was shorter than I had expected and it died before dinner on our first day. Easy fix is to keep it off when not using it vs. letting it sleep. The battery is charged through the camera vs. having an external charging block which i prefer. All in all I am pretty pleased with the camera. After it dying on us relatively early on day 1, we learned to keep it off, and it survived long days at Disney and Universal Studios. The slower speed and shorter battery life are not an inconvenience enough to give it 4 stars, but just be aware. It is an excellent camera that can take the abuse an active person will throw at it. expand » « collapse
Item.HelpfulCount: 2 out of 2 found this review helpful.

Item.Item: Olympus µ[MJU:] TOUGH-8010 14 MP Digital Camera (Platinum silver)
Item.Review:
Pros: Great pics, Great video, WATERPROOF, Panoramic Setting!
Cons: Battery life only 1 day (see note), USB charger only (see note)
Took this to Costa Rica and it was pretty much abused. Waterfalls, rain, whitewater rafting, ziplining and snorkeling - it went EVERYWHERE! I had no leaks, got GREAT video!! Suggestion - go to a dive shop or sporting goods store and get a SECOND strap for it - I had a tight dive strap that we could hook onto life vests and the zipline gear. I also purchased the float strap that is made specifically for the camera by Olympus - together they worked great! Got the float strap mostly for the whitewater rafting and snorkeling. Took GREAT underwater pics! Snapped a shot of just some coral - when reviewing the pics later - it actually got a juveni ... le gray angelfish (I just barely saw the blue in the picture) - when I zoomed in - CRYSTAL CLEAR shot of the fish - I was probably about 8-10 feet from it - and juveniles are pretty small. Taking this on my next vacation to do MORE snorkeling at the beach - hands down worth every penny!!!! DEFINITELY get a second battery - I pretty much drained it each day. You must have a USB charger or computer for it (really the only downside) - I had a wall adapter in CR b/c I did NOT want to bring my computer with me. Worked JUST FINE! Seriously - if you're just an amateur and want a great camera (does REALLY GREAT video too!) that can go anywhere - this is a great investment. I also own a Canon EOS Rebel Digital SLR with multiple lenses - the megapixel quality between the two is minimal (the Canon is 15, this one is 14). The added waterproof feature of this camera made the trip so much better as I did not miss ANY shots and was able to get a TON of video as well! I still love my SLR and will always take it, but I also love water :) Oh - and the panoramic setting - WOW! Just a word - you may want to do the "edges" yourself rather than use their target - with water shots (i.e. of moving water like the beach or waterfall) the target did not work as well - worked GREAT with large trees/stationary objects. This is a FANTASTIC feature on this came ... expand » « collapse

Item.Item: Olympus µ[MJU:] TOUGH-8010 14 MP Digital Camera (Platinum silver)
Item.Review:
Pros: Easy to use
Cons: Software is a change; Battery life
Camera is terriffic and though "reconditioned" appears and operates as new. The varity of different settings pretty much allows a person to shoot pictures and movies of anything they need. They are kind of cheap with the small capacity card included with camera but additional card will take care of that. The battery seems to get used up a bit quicker than my previous camera but I can live with it for the capability I have now. A spare battery solves that issue. Not including a separate battery charger with camera means you have to stay connected unless you buy one. Chargers are cheap and have adaptors for autos. The biggest change (i.e. headache) for me is the new software included. I am not quite as into the social m ... edia and cloud scene and find I prefer the older version of software for editing. The new software has some amazing capabilities that I am experimenting with. I haven't tested the waterproof capability or shockproof but am confident it will be fine. The Tough features are what most influence my decision after having had Tough versions of previous models. expand » « collapse

Item.Item: Olympus µ[MJU:] TOUGH-8010 14 MP Digital Camera (Platinum silver)
Item.ReviewTitle: All I wanted in a camera and more!
Item.Review:
Pros: Great Zoom; Easy To Use; Large Clear LCD; Nice Body Color; Small / Compact; Good Image Quality; Flexibility
Just arrived the other week. Bought it for a vacation. Limited use so far, it has so many options to choose from. having fun experimenting. I'll know more about it's true range of use after I get back from the Caribbean in a week.

Item.Item: Olympus µ[MJU:] TOUGH-8010 14 MP Digital Camera (Platinum silver)
Item.Review:
Pros: Can be used underwater
Cons: Picture quality, speed, short battery life, ease of use
I bought this camera to take snorkeling or on shallow, <33ft, dives after hearing great reviews from friends who already owned one. It was quite easy to use at first but the picture quality was extremely sub-par. Colors appeared muted and overall the pictures always come out looking like they have poor compression even when the camera is set for no compression. The menu settings are way too sensitive and I always seem to be changing the scene mode by accident. The camera is slow to boot compared to other point and shoots, slow to focus and the buttons are not layed out to facilitate easy one handed operation. Due to this, underwater pictures while snorkeling are difficult to make and ... my experience has been 1-2 clear pictures out of 10 shot. Poor performance for a $350 camera.
My 4 year old Canon SD600 takes much clearer and more vibrant pictures is more user friendly. The Olympus' only redeeming quality is that it works under water but not well enough to justify the price. Save your money and buy a disposable film one or spend the extra for a better camera. expand » « collapse

Item.Item: Olympus µ[MJU:] TOUGH-8010 14 MP Digital Camera (Platinum silver)
Item.Review:
Pros: Large Clear LCD; Easy To Use; Nice Body Color
Cons: Poor in Low Light
The lens is small, so its low light capture is very limited. Prior Olympus Stylus was much better in low light situations. The trade-off is for durability. The Stylus got dirt in the lens gears, so one day it wouldn't open/close without some help. I bought this to take outdoors without having to worry about losing functionality mid-trip. For that purpose at [$] it's definitely good. Full retail at [$] would be a ripoff.

Item.Item: Olympus µ[MJU:] TOUGH-8010 14 MP Digital Camera (Platinum silver)
Item.Review:
Pros: Durability, works no matter what, did i mention durability, compact
Cons: no editing software, settings take time to learn, slow to start up.
I am really tough on electronics. i bought this camera to live a very active lifestyle. i use this camera for everything from tubing the river to four wheeling to basketball games. It does as good as any point and shoot i've used. there is a ton of untapped potential through learning some settings. i have dropped in some rapids where it hit some rocks with velocity. it has bounced around the dash and cup holder of my jeep off road. I have dropped it from 2-3 feet a few times onto hard surfaces. so far it hasn't faltered at all. I AM FOLLOWING ALL THE CARE INSTRUCTIONS TO MAINTAIN THE WATER PROOF SEALS. I did get the protection pla ... n just in case my life overwhelms the camera. i have had the camera for two months.
I am constantly surprised by how cool some of the features are. with some practice, i'm going to get some fantastic images with this camera.
I wish this camera came with software for photo and video editing. that is the only real complaint for a 400 dollar camera.
this camera has a slow start up compared to my other cameras. when photoing action, you have to really be ready. expand » « collapse

Item.Item: Olympus µ[MJU:] TOUGH-8010 14 MP Digital Camera (Platinum silver)
Item.ReviewTitle: Awesome Camera Built Like a Tank.
Item.Review:
Pros: Takes great pictures, HD video looks good, ease of use
Cons: Nothing yet.
bought this camera because of the way its built, like a tank. Nice weight, probably wouldnt want to keep it in a shirt pocket but would fit good in a pair of pants or loose jeans. The outdoor pictures ive taken have come out perfect, havent used the underwater feature yet. This is the way a camera should be made, perfect for taking anywhere and taking a beating. If your always dropping things, breaking stuff, or scratching lenses, this is the camera for u. I purchased a coolpix s70 before this one and brought it right back to the store because it was horrible.(picture quality was poor and the whole back of the camera is touch screen so its hard to hold without messing up a setting) The olympus had ... one flaw when i purchased it though. There was a black dot that would show up on my indoor pictures because of something that appeared to be on the inside of the lens. Called the 800 number to see about returning to get another 8010, and was pleasantly surprised that a new camera was on its way out to me the same day!! Thats awesome customer service. Anyway the camera is great and would recommend it to anyone looking for a solid camera that takes great pics and video. Im not an expert but i also have a nikon d60 when a dslr is needed. The olympus is great to use when the nikon is unpractical. A++++ expand » « collapse

Item.Item: Olympus µ[MJU:] TOUGH-8010 14 MP Digital Camera (Platinum silver)
Item.ReviewTitle: Don't buy this piece of junk.
Item.Review:
Pros: nothing, its junk, poorly designed.
Cons: Poor quality photos.
I have owned this camera for about 4 months now. I am very disappointed in its function, focus, speed, ease of use. At least every other picture taken is blurred, dark or just poor quality. I have tried all settings, the zooming features of this camera are poor. The position of the lens is placed exactly were your fingers normally would comfortably be placed. Therefore, your finger is blocking the shot. It eats batteries faster than any other camera I have owned. Its speed is slow even with a class 10 memory chip and freshly charged battery. When manually "Trying" to adjust the camera settings, some settings are not accessible and when you turn the camera off, it resets itself and the dialed in settings are ... lost. Do not buy this junk. I am scared to see how water proof it is considering how poor everything else is on it. Also the viewing window is blurry while snaping. expand » « collapse

Item.Item: Olympus µ[MJU:] TOUGH-8010 14 MP Digital Camera (Platinum silver)
Item.Review:
Pros: Takes great pictures; Compact; Easy to Use; A lot of cool features
Very happy with this camera. It has a lot of cool features and takes great pictures. So glad I purchased it. The only down fall is the battery life is a bit less than I hoped but is decent. It will last almost a full day with frequent use before you have to charge it again. Overall a great camera and price is very reasonable for what this camera does.

Item.Item: Olympus µ[MJU:] TOUGH-8010 14 MP Digital Camera (Platinum silver)
Item.Review:
Pros: IT DOES EVERYTHING
Cons: Weight
I bought this camera for my husband for our Saint Lucia trip. It help up to everything. It did take us a while before we mastered all the settings ie one for water and snow, one for night time, one for fireworks btu one we have it down we were good to go. The underwater pics from snorkeling were clear (as clear as the water) and detailed. The botonical gardens were brilliant and the color fantastic. We discovered we could even turn down the MP on one setting. When we got home the software automatically uploaded, allowed us to map the location, store on our network drive and even compiled a great slideshow. The software was easy to use. The only downfall? The camera is a little heavier than other models.

Item.Item: Olympus µ[MJU:] TOUGH-8010 14 MP Digital Camera (Platinum silver)
Item.ReviewTitle: Difficult to use, no manual, no remote charge
Item.Review:
Pros: Exterior design and ability to scan through picture history very fast.
Cons: Lack of remote battery charger. Inability to use camera while charging. Lack of printed manual.
The camera has an excellent design and many nice features which are difficult to use. The ability to take sequential pictures is a plus. Getting the flash and correct lighting settings to function correctly are difficult probably because the camera does not come with a readily accessible instruction manual which could take one through the operating steps. A manual is available if you want to download and carry 83 pages around with you. The camera does not come with a separte remote battery charger. And one can only charge the battery while it is still in the camera using the same wiring that is used ... to download pictures. Sounds simple but it requires disconnecting the wiring from the computer and carrying it with you in order to remotely charge the battery which takes about 3 to 4 hours. You can charge the battery through the computer. The picture taking capability of the camera can not be used while charging the battery. Thus rendering the camera useless. A separtely purchased back-up battery helps solve the time delay problem but the ability to take many pictures is negated by the lack of a remote battery charger. expand » « collapse

Item.Item: Olympus µ[MJU:] TOUGH-8010 14 MP Digital Camera (Platinum silver)
Item.Review:
Pros: Small / Compact
Cons: Poor in Low Light; Complicated Controls
The product is ok! 14MP pictures lack sharpness of the image. The video recording is impressive but not the best part of the package. Ability to (optical) zoom underwater is really the best part. I haven't had a chance to test the sharpness of the images with zoom (underwater) yet. Will try to update the review after I test that.

Item.Item: Olympus µ[MJU:] TOUGH-8010 14 MP Digital Camera (Platinum silver)
Item.Review:
Pros: Shock Proof, Water Proof, Crush Proof, Features & Megapixels for the money!
Cons: charging the battery while it's in the camera: this exposes dust & air into the battery/sd card chamber while charging.
I actually walked into Bestbuy ready to buy another camera, this one caught my eye! After reading features. I like the fact the manual & software is on the camera; anywhere I go I have it! The functions are easy to use: just read the manual! The quality of Picture is almost as good as my professional Nikon D90 Camera: Overall this Camera continues to amaze me!

Item.Item: Olympus µ[MJU:] TOUGH-8010 14 MP Digital Camera (Platinum silver)
Item.Review:
Pros: Uses standard mini usb; Great Build Quality
Cons: Short Battery Life; No RAW option; Slow charge; Clunky interface
Battery life is very bad. Having 2-3 spares is needed, but you can only charge them in the camera. Video is not enough FPS.
Casual beach/underwater stuff and this camera is fine.

Item.Item: Olympus µ[MJU:] TOUGH-8010 14 MP Digital Camera (Platinum silver)
Item.Review:
Pros: Simple controls, withstands poor environments, solid feel, very good picture quality, many picture modes and features
Cons: Charge battery only in-camera, slow picture save, non-standard mini-usb connector, usb camera connection somewhat loose
The Olympus Stylus Tough 8010 digital camera withstands inhospitable environments while taking very good pictures. The heavy-duty housing is well-sealed from the elements, with the battery compartment and usb and hdmi connections sealed by an o-ring protected double-locked door.
Initial camera set-up is VERY simple. After inserting and partly charging the battery (via the camera USB connection), camera initialization can be performed from the attached computer. Image-processing software can also be installed from the camera ... itself. The software is basic, but does have a couple of Olympus-specific touches.
Out of the box, users must charge the replaceable battery via the usb connection while the battery is in the camera; via a computer or the provided wall charger. In order to continue shooting, I've since purchased an external charger and extra battery so that I can swap batteries and continue shooting while recharging the depleted cell. Both are readily available from online vendors; both Olympus original and facsimiles.
The camera has numerous scene modes, face recognition, and effective anti-shake technology. The panorama mode is nice, but slow to stitch pictures together and is not entirely accurate.
Shot delay from the time that the shutter is pressed sometimes causes a moment to be missed. Save times for 14 mb images to a SDHC card are a bit lengthy.
The non-standard mini-usb connection at the camera end is less-than-secure, causing occasional connect-disconnect cycling.
Overall, I find this camera relatively easy to use; though it can be confusing to a digital photography newcomer. The camera can be set to a fully-automatic mode for those folks. I've not yet explored all of the scene modes, but the three tried thus far aid in obtaining sharp pictures.
For someone who wants a capable camera that can be used at the beach or in the pool; this is the best I've found. For those who don't need weather or environment resistance, other choices at approximately ... expand » « collapse

Item.Item: Olympus µ[MJU:] TOUGH-8010 14 MP Digital Camera (Platinum silver)
Item.Review:
Pros: Nice Body Color; Easy To Use; Great Zoom
Cons: Poor Image Quality; Lag / Shutter Delay
The start up time and lag between photos were too long. The images were not quite as sharp as those from my previous Canon SD750 either. It was great fun to use underwater though.

Item.Item: Olympus µ[MJU:] TOUGH-8010 14 MP Digital Camera (Platinum silver)
Item.Review:
Pros: Nice Body Color; Fast/accurate auto-focus; Large Clear LCD; Great Zoom; Easy To Use; Small / Compact; Good Image Stabilization; Good Image Quality
Cons: Lag / Shutter Delay; Poor Flash; No Viewfinder
Everything looks good I got this camera so I can use it with my Grandkids at the pool and Beach. I shot my granddau 4th B-Day party with this their were lots and lots of kids their and for all the bumps i got, all my pictures were good This was a nice way to learn this camera(Easy to Learn) Stabilization worked great need it with so many kids.. did a small video and it looked great also. The event went well and my pictures of it did the same.Can't wait tell i can use it at the Beach and pool. Good By Nikonos.This is a 5 star point and shoot camera. thank you Olympus.

Item.Item: Olympus µ[MJU:] TOUGH-8010 14 MP Digital Camera (Platinum silver)
Item.ReviewTitle: Great features and able to withstand abuse
Item.Review:
Pros: easy to use! performs well underwater and takes a beating.
I purchased this camera to take on vacation and was very pleased with the performance. The ease of immediately taking a video (with or without sound) and taking pictures underwater were two of the features I used often. The ability to take rapid shutter pics was a nice option to have as well. Very Pleased !

Item.Item: Olympus µ[MJU:] TOUGH-8010 14 MP Digital Camera (Platinum silver)
Item.Review:
I bought this camera for my daughter for Christmas because it is what she asked for. The camera looks to be very sturdy and tough but also heavy, the image quality is just so-so. It doesn't take bad pictures just should be better. We returned it for a refund. She probably would have kept it if it wasn't so expensive. She should be able to get a camera that takes better pictures for less money, just won't have the "tough" body.
She was probably expecting too much. You have to sacrifice something for the toughness of the camera. In order to keep the lens protected inside the body you must keep the lens short and covered which limits the optics.
My son's girlfriend had an Olympus similar to this but lost it. They found it a year later rattling around in the bilge of his boat, ... covered in an oily mess. The camera still works to this day. expand » « collapse

Item.Item: Olympus µ[MJU:] TOUGH-8010 14 MP Digital Camera (Platinum silver)
Item.Review:
Pros: WATERPROOF
Cons: The battery life was a little too low, suggest getting a back up for longer shooting times.
This was for my wife and it is real easy to use, the pixel strength was great, and there are a lot of nice features on this camera.

Item.Item: Olympus µ[MJU:] TOUGH-8010 14 MP Digital Camera (Platinum silver)
Item.Review:
Pros: Good Battery Life; Small / Compact; Large Clear LCD; Fast Shutter Speed; Easy to Use; Good in Low Light; Great Resolution; Great Zoom
Just took my camera to Freeport in the Bahamas. Main reason was for snorkeling, which was cancelled because of the bad weather (Debbie). Anyway I used it in the pool, for the waterslide and on the beach. Was VERY easy to use and both the pictures and videos turned out GREAT. When you want to switch from pictures to video, it's just the push of one (1) button. No more going into the menue and scrolling down to find video. Can't wait until next time so I can go snorkeling with it.

Item.Item: Olympus µ[MJU:] TOUGH-8010 14 MP Digital Camera (Platinum silver)
Item.Review:
Pros: Good Image Quality; Easy To Use; Fast/accurate auto-focus
great under water except hard to use viewfinder under water. Nice till 33ft. Better if deeper for the scuba diver.

Item.Item: Olympus µ[MJU:] TOUGH-8010 14 MP Digital Camera (Platinum silver)
Item.Review:
Pros: Good in Low Light; Easy to Use; Great Resolution; Large Clear LCD
Cons: Lag / Shutter Delay
This is a great camera. Easy to use with great resolution above and under the water. Quite a bit bulkier than the older version of the same camera. Our old stylus tough is still working perfectly despite submerging, dropping and letting small kids use it.

Item.Item: Olympus µ[MJU:] TOUGH-8010 14 MP Digital Camera (Platinum silver)
Item.ReviewTitle: Great pictures, very durable, menu too busy
Item.Review:
Pros: Outstanding picture quality and durability
Cons: on-screen menu too busy
A great functioning camera, this model replaced my Stylus 850 which served me will for two and a half years. Everything I loved about the Sylus 850 is still there, with greatly improved pitcure quality. The panorama feature is way cool! On the down side, the on-screen menu is just too busy. It's a perfect camera for kayaking and water sports. Follow the directions on rinsing after it's been used in fresh or salt water and you won't have to pay the >$100 rebuild price I paid for my 850.

Item.Item: Olympus µ[MJU:] TOUGH-8010 14 MP Digital Camera (Platinum silver)
Item.Review:
Pros: waterproof
Cons: shutter speed, picture quality, panoramic stitching
If I could use one sentence to describe this camera that would be it. The pictures are not great. The shutter speed is incredibly slow even at the fastest settings, the picture quality is average at best, and the features are more for impressiveness than practicality. The one GREAT thing about this camera is the waterproof feature. If you want a camera that takes great photos underwater, this is it. The pictures are clear, the focus is good and the camera holds up well in the ocean. The water video is also very good. I bought this camera for a week in a Hawaii, probably one of the clearest most amazing waters and scenery in the world. The water pictures came out great, the remaining "land" pictures wer ... e not amazing. Honestly, except for that one feature, this camera is not really worth it. the freezeproof is only useful if you plan on going to Antartica, the crush proof is not that necessary (after all I think most of us have sat on our cameras at least once and seen they dont break that easily) and the shatter proof is only about 5 or 6 feet height, which again, if you have ever had a camera you've probably dropped it from that height at least 3 times. Finally, the panoramic stitching is wretched. In the auto mode it stitched the pictures in the wrong place and in the manual mode it shows the stitching. expand » « collapse

Item.Item: Olympus µ[MJU:] TOUGH-8010 14 MP Digital Camera (Platinum silver)
Item.Review:
Pros: Everything!!!
Cons: Haven't found anything yet!
Camera takes great pictures and videos. The battery lasted longer than I expected. I was afraid of dropping it beyond my reach so I bought a floating case for it.

Item.Item: Olympus µ[MJU:] TOUGH-8010 14 MP Digital Camera (Platinum silver)
Item.Review:
Pros: Totally durable
Cons: nothing so far
This is a great "stick in your pocket" camera. You can take it anywhere and get shots you can't get with other cameras. Very easy to use. Enough options for different shooting situations without overloading the menu choices. I took it into the ocean, the pool, golf course, and around town. Get the Olympus floating strap to go with it.

Item.Item: Olympus µ[MJU:] TOUGH-8010 14 MP Digital Camera (Platinum silver)
Item.Review:
Pros: Small / Compact; Great camera; Easy to Use; Good Battery Life
Loved the durability of this camera and the price. My twins love to grab the cameras, so I know this one can handle it. Very nice style camera.

Item.Item: Olympus µ[MJU:] TOUGH-8010 14 MP Digital Camera (Platinum silver)
Item.Review:
Pros: Fast Shutter Speed; Small / Compact; Good in Low Light; Good Battery Life; Great Zoom; Large Clear LCD; Easy to Use; Great Resolution
This camera does it all!! Best camera you can buy especailly if you have small children who like to always play with your electronics or bite on things. This camera is indistructable! It does it all! Unbelievable underwater pictures even at night!!! The pictures come out beautiful. The video option is even great! It has alot of different modes to play with took me like 1 and 1/2 days to figure it all out very easy to use!!! I highly reccomend this camera!

Item.Item: Olympus µ[MJU:] TOUGH-8010 14 MP Digital Camera (Platinum silver)
Item.Review:
Pros: Shockproof, Waterproof, Frostproof, 14mp,Crushproof, HD Video
Cons: The software on the internal memory is not Mac compatable.
I cannot give this camera a 5 star rating as this is my second one, the first one was "dead on arrival." However, the second one is perfect so far and takes great pictures,

Item.Item: Olympus µ[MJU:] TOUGH-8010 14 MP Digital Camera (Platinum silver)
Item.Review:
Pros: Everything...I especially love the quality of pics underwater
Cons: Only 5X optical zoom, slow performance
I bought this produce hesitantly before a family trip to Mexico. I wanted a good quality compact camera that could also take video for my sons sports when a bigger camcorder was not necessarily feasible. I went with this camera over a Canon and Samsung that got better reviews for video taking and picture quality, therefore I was hesitant about the quality of pics. However, I did not want to lug around my snorkel camera and strobe. This camera surpassed every expectation that I had. The quality of pics from our vacation are excellent in all settings. The underwater pics turned out with better quality then my snorkel specific camera with strobe. Once you get familiar ... with the settings you can take great pics in every situation, however iauto works well for the most part. Only issue was the slow pic processing, however that is not a necessity for me. Well worth the money and extremely versatile. Had it in the ocean or pool nearly the whole vacation and did not have one issue. This may be the best overall cam/camcorder purchase that I have ever made.....we will see if it holds up over the next copule of years as its' name indicates. expand » « collapse
Item.HelpfulCount: 0 out of 1 found this review helpful.

Item.Item: Olympus µ[MJU:] TOUGH-8010 14 MP Digital Camera (Platinum silver)
Item.Review:
Pros: Beautiful picture quality & tons of features
Cons: short battery life keep charger handy
Great for surf or turf. Took my Tough to Cancun and got great snorkling pics

Item.Item: Olympus µ[MJU:] TOUGH-8010 14 MP Digital Camera (Platinum silver)
Item.ReviewTitle: Amazing for a beginners underwater camera.
Item.Review:
Pros: Great features!
Cons: Too pricy!
I love this camera... i used it down in the florida keys and took some great pictures... It's really easy to use, and i like the color blue it came in.

Item.Item: Olympus µ[MJU:] TOUGH-8010 14 MP Digital Camera (Platinum silver)
Item.ReviewTitle: Great camera for the all around outdoor adventurer
Item.Review:
Pros: New design and upgrades.
Cons: Not a thing
I had an Olympus 8000 that got H2O inside when I forgot to close the charge port and had the dive captain on a boat in the Bahamas toss me the camera off the boat with a floatee attached. It was in the water 2 seconds but that was enough to mess it up. But, I really liked the camera and decided to buy the 8010.......which has some nice new features. No more 2GB XD. SDHDC now. And one hatch instead of TWO which locks in a fashion that makes it hard to forget. 14MB pic quality. So, I am almost glad my 8000 flooded. I REALLY like the 8010.

Item.Item: Olympus µ[MJU:] TOUGH-8010 14 MP Digital Camera (Platinum silver)
Item.Review:
Pros: Good Image Quality; Easy To Use; Good Image Stabilization
Great product. Was concerned initally because of reviews mentioning water leaking into camera after 1st or 2nd use. My husband and I used it every day in the water in Hawaii and have absolutely no complaints. Our pictures turned out better than we could have imagined and it was cool to be able to shoot video under water as well. Didn't realize until after the first time shooting a video that it records noises as well as we were able to get some whale calls in the background of our vidoe while we were recording a turtle. Very impressive!

Item.Item: Olympus µ[MJU:] TOUGH-8010 14 MP Digital Camera (Platinum silver)
Item.Review:
Pros: great pictures under any condition
Cons: nothing
I love this camera! I can't say enough great things about it. Very crisp clean pictures. Settings are simple to use and there is a setting for every situation you might find yourself shooting in. 14 mega pixels are great! A feature that I love is that it can underwater and is a super tough camera that can take any abuse that you throw at it literally! The price is super great for the features it has and what you can do with it. There's nothing like being able to shoot underwater. Everthing about this camera is GREAT!

Item.Item: Olympus µ[MJU:] TOUGH-8010 14 MP Digital Camera (Platinum silver)
Item.Review:
Pros: All the Great settings
Cons: Were the shutter is.
I really like this camera. It have a lot of great settings on it. One thing that I don't really but the more I use it I am sure I will fix is I see in some of my pictures I see my finger tip. But I do like this camera very much!

Item.Item: Olympus µ[MJU:] TOUGH-8010 14 MP Digital Camera (Platinum silver)
Item.Review:
Pros: Wide lenses
Cons: Very slow and not easy to use.
Very slow to start and to take pictures. Just changed from a class 2 card to a 4 to see if it makes a difference. Lenses angle are great. Features not easy to use. Focus does not work all the time. I may not be using it correctly. Have not tried to use it under water yet.

Item.Item: Olympus µ[MJU:] TOUGH-8010 14 MP Digital Camera (Platinum silver)
Item.Review:
Pros: Worry free when kids use. Cool underwater and panoramic features.
Cons: Batteries need to charge in camera, slow to be ready again after taking photo.
Love not having to worry about kids using camera. Panoramic shots are easy and great. Would have liked a users guide to have come in package. On camera guide is basic. Do not like having to charge batteries while in camera. The view screen doesn't show photos well enough to know for certain that a good shot was taken until seeing it loaded on computer which leads to taking more shots 'just in case'. Overall this is a cool camera that takes great photos. It just takes some getting used to. Again, I LOVE not having to worry about the kids grabbing the camera to take a photo. They have the most interesting perspective which ... makes their photos sometimes much better than the adults. expand » « collapse

Item.Item: Olympus µ[MJU:] TOUGH-8010 14 MP Digital Camera (Platinum silver)
Item.ReviewTitle: Too scared to give it hell
Item.Review:
Pros: ability to be a liitle rough with it
Cons: settings are somewhat difficult to figure out
I purchased this camera for our vacation to the ocean with the kids this summer. Can't wait to use it for that. I've used it for an outside shot of a banquet and was hoping to blow the picture up to poster size. The 5x7 came out right, but the poster didn't. I've got to experiment more with it and get the settings right.

Item.Item: Olympus µ[MJU:] TOUGH-8010 14 MP Digital Camera (Platinum silver)
Item.ReviewTitle: Have to get used to the many features available
Item.Review:
Pros: toughness
I upgraded from a lower model and really love this camera. The size is great. I love all of the extra features available with this camera along with the "toughness". I figures out the panorama feature and use it a lot.

Item.Item: Olympus µ[MJU:] TOUGH-8010 14 MP Digital Camera (Platinum silver)
Item.Review:
Cons: Not Waterproof as it Claims
I used this camera for the first time underwater. It was only about 1 foot underwater, which is much less than the max, and it is now ruined. It will not even turn on. I messaged the company and their only advice was that I should have replaced the waterproof seals. The camera also cracked the screen from dropping it 3 feet, which should not happen either. DO NOT BUY THIS CAMERA. IT IS NOT SHOCKPROOF OR WATERPROOF. There are many better options out there for you. I wish I would have known this before buying this camera!

Item.Item: Olympus µ[MJU:] TOUGH-8010 14 MP Digital Camera (Platinum silver)
Item.Review:
Pros: very durable, seems to have worked out the kinks of the earlier model
Cons: scrolling through pics is slower than before, and the rapid fire shutter option is also a bit slower.
I had purchased the earlier model of this camera and it broke underwater (which it was supposed to be able to handle) they seem to have fixed the problem with a tighter seal around the battery compartment. it is a perfect camera for the active person, i bring it white water rafting, snowboarding, and on scuba dives. picture quality is very good and the ease and speed at which one can switch to video mode helps when things are happeneing quickly.

Item.Item: Olympus µ[MJU:] TOUGH-8010 14 MP Digital Camera (Platinum silver)
Item.ReviewTitle: Bring action memories home with you
Item.Review:
Pros: Secure seal lock; Underwater features; Compact for snow skiing; Magnificant clear images; Focuses quickly; Easy to set up for shot
Cons: Difficult to hold on to; Fingers get in viewfinder
This compact pocket camera easily goes everywhere and captures every action activity from sea to sky, beach to mountaintop worry-free. Without risk to your camera, it quickly adjusts to scene, zooms, and focuses fast, so you take hundreds of shots. Its so handy, I need a way to keep my finger out of the photo - I want to "hold" the corner where the lens opens.

Item.Item: Olympus µ[MJU:] TOUGH-8010 14 MP Digital Camera (Platinum silver)
Item.Review:
Pros: Easy To Use; Large Clear LCD; Great Zoom; Good Image Quality
I bought this to use on the beach and kayaking, and it takes great pictures. It's a little heavy, but worth it, to have a camera you can take along in these conditions and get great pictures from. I'm thrilled!

Item.Item: Olympus µ[MJU:] TOUGH-8010 14 MP Digital Camera (Platinum silver)
Item.Review: We bought this camera because we needed a rugged, waterproof camera for our kayak outings. We have not gone kayaking with it yet, but we have used it in a cold snowy situation, and another time on a vacation trip to Hilton Head. It took good pictures in sub zero temperatures, and also good beach pictures. It has a really cool burst photo feature on it, and we also like the panoramic photo feature on it. The only thing we wished the camera could do, would be a little faster between taking individual photos. We also own a sd 1000 Canon camera, and it is a lot faster between single photos.

Item.Item: Olympus µ[MJU:] TOUGH-8010 14 MP Digital Camera (Platinum silver)
Item.Review:
Pros: Toughness
Cons: Battery life
We purchased this camera just prior to a Caribbean cruise and used it during several shore excursions for snorkeling, kayaking, and playing on the beaches. Also tested the device the the swimming pool on the ship. Produced many great pictures of coral reefs, sea turtles, fish, and anything/everything underwater. Very sturdy camera and can barely see any scratches; easy to operate like any other point and shoot digital camera; stylish looking in blue (only color available on that shopping day); and also takes decent pictures out of the water. Sure it is not a D-SLR, but try taking one of those underwater. Overall, a great camera for almost any setting.

Item.Item: Olympus µ[MJU:] TOUGH-8010 14 MP Digital Camera (Platinum silver)
Item.Review:
Pros: Robust; Work underwater; Durable; Strong
Cons: Slow; Not good for kid pictures; Extremely slow
I had to return the camera. It was extremely slow to turn on the camera, to take pictures, the flash was slow. However, if you do not care about speed, it was a durable camera. The structure design of the camera you can tell it is robust.

Item.Item: Olympus µ[MJU:] TOUGH-8010 14 MP Digital Camera (Platinum silver)
Item.ReviewTitle: Good Camera feature but Flashlight worse
Item.Review: had some cool settings, panorama function was useless, looked better on computer though. does fail on reading the SD Card. Need pop out and pop in again for it to work. The flash light and worse issue make the eyes blink every time it flash.

Item.Item: Olympus µ[MJU:] TOUGH-8010 14 MP Digital Camera (Platinum silver)
Item.Review:
Pros: durable
Cons: poor picture quality and slow to respond
We've owned two earlier models of the Olympus Stylus and were very excited to purchase another one. Unfortunately, compared to earlier models, this model falls short on picture quality and button response time. We kept the camera because of it's durablity and because it is water resistant. My husband was taking it to Afghanistan where it is very dusty and we chose durability over quality.

Item.Item: Olympus µ[MJU:] TOUGH-8010 14 MP Digital Camera (Platinum silver)
Item.Review:
Pros: easy to set up , underwater, picture quality
Cons: chunky
AMAZING picture quality I love using it, BUY IT! I love it I use it everyday and the battery quality is amazing. I love that I can go underwater and that it doest break when I drop it

Item.Item: Olympus µ[MJU:] TOUGH-8010 14 MP Digital Camera (Platinum silver)
Item.Review:
Cons: It can be somewhat confusing
this camera was absolutely delightful to have during our family vacation this winter. The picture quality is excellent and the unique features have been fun to learn. My oldest son liked ours so much, he asked for one for Christmas.

Item.Item: Olympus µ[MJU:] TOUGH-8010 14 MP Digital Camera (Platinum silver)
Item.Review:
Pros: Tough, Water resistant, Great HD Video
Cons: It's kinda plain looking, but it grows on you.
The HD video is great, I have a lot of video of fish being caught with subsequent underwater release shots. Have used it several times as deep as 30' on Looe Key. Interestingly when the viz is not great there are tons of fish around, and the video quality is good even in poor viz conditions. I use it with an 8GB SanDisk Extreme 30MB/sec card and have had no problems with the slow performance that I had read about in other reviews. I like this camera enough to have bought a second one as a gift.

Item.Item: Olympus µ[MJU:] TOUGH-8010 14 MP Digital Camera (Platinum silver)
Item.Review:
Pros: Good in Low Light; Fast Shutter Speed; Great Zoom; Small / Compact; Large Clear LCD; Easy to Use
Cons: Short Battery Life
I used this camera on a recent vacation to Cancun, Mexico. It was great underwater and fantastic above water (which I was not expecting at all). I would recommend this camera to anyone, it is so easy to use. The only complaint I have is that it has a short battery life.

Item.Item: Olympus µ[MJU:] TOUGH-8010 14 MP Digital Camera (Platinum silver)
Item.Review: There are alot of settings to get familiar with on this camera, Dont just buy it and use it before learning the functions. Its a little slow turning on, and a little slow flipping from picture to picture. For everyday use i still use my kodak camera cause its easier to function and faster to get out and snap a shot of the kids. But its a reliable camera for extreme conditions.

Item.Item: Olympus µ[MJU:] TOUGH-8010 14 MP Digital Camera (Platinum silver)
Item.Review:
Pros: Great Zoom; Good Image Quality; Small / Compact; Large Clear LCD; Good in Low Light; Good Image Stabilization; Easy To Use; Nice Body Color
This camera follows me everywhere. Out on the water kayak, snorkeling, diving or just running around town on my bike it's always there. At the ready for that perfect picture of anthing. This camera is just great fun

Item.Item: Olympus µ[MJU:] TOUGH-8010 14 MP Digital Camera (Platinum silver)
Item.ReviewTitle: Good, but sometimes did not focus correctly
Item.Review: Good camera! It worked very well underwater, but auto-focus did not always work (in the air). Occassionally required that I turn the camera off and "reboot" to get the auto-focus to work.

Item.Item: Olympus µ[MJU:] TOUGH-8010 14 MP Digital Camera (Platinum silver)
Item.Review:
Pros: Easy To Use; Large Clear LCD; Good Image Quality; Great Zoom; Small / Compact; Good in Low Light; Nice Body Color
Cons: Slow load time when start; Poor Image Stabilization
Use this camera while on the water kayaking. Takes great pictures and is bulletproof
Little slow loading up when you turn it on.

Item.Item: Olympus µ[MJU:] TOUGH-8010 14 MP Digital Camera (Platinum silver)
Item.ReviewTitle: An Awesome Camera - Easy to Use!!!
Item.Review:
Pros: Ease of Use
I read many reviews about this camera before I purchased it and was worried I wasn't going to like it. But to my surprise...this camera is amazing!!! Very easy to set up, understand, and use. Even my children love to use it. Takes great pictures and video. Would recommend it to everyone!

Item.Item: Olympus µ[MJU:] TOUGH-8010 14 MP Digital Camera (Platinum silver)
Item.Review:
Pros: Short Lag Time; Good in Low Light; Easy To Use; Large Clear LCD; Small / Compact
Cons: Charging takes long time
If you want amazing underwater shots, this is the camera to buy. I went on a snorkeling trip with friends and everyone wanted to borrow my camera! Just don't let it go, it does sink. Great panoramic pictures, too, if you can match up the edges. Overall the best waterproof camera I have come across. Don't forget to maintain it (very easy to do) like the directions say, especially after being in salt water.

Item.Item: Olympus µ[MJU:] TOUGH-8010 14 MP Digital Camera (Platinum silver)
Item.ReviewTitle: Capturing moments in & out of the water
Item.Review:
Pros: Large Clear LCD; Good Battery Life; Easy to Use; Great Zoom; Great Resolution; Small / Compact
Cons: Lag / Shutter Delay
Since I love swimming and snorkeling, this is a good camera to use - ease of use underwater, no complicated buttons and no need to use an underwater case! Pictures are stunning and crisp.

Item.Item: Olympus µ[MJU:] TOUGH-8010 14 MP Digital Camera (Platinum silver)
Item.Review:
Pros: Small, waterproof, many options
Cons: My husband wants to use it...lol!
I bought this camera so I wouldn't have to worry about it getting wet poolside or seaside, and because of the reviews and size. So far I have been very happy with it, but am still learning how I can use different settings to my advantage. I love it!

Item.Item: Olympus µ[MJU:] TOUGH-8010 14 MP Digital Camera (Platinum silver)
Item.Review:
Pros: waterproof and underwater photos
Cons: battery is terrible
This would be an extremely great camera if it had a better battery. You have to charge the battery when it’s in the camera and then the battery only lasts for approximately 50 photos and that is half with flash and half without. I have two batteries and they both are the same. Takes great underwater shots

Item.Item: Olympus µ[MJU:] TOUGH-8010 14 MP Digital Camera (Platinum silver)
Item.ReviewTitle: Great Camera Right out of the box
Item.Review:
Pros: Ready to use, durable, and everything else
Cons: Nothing so far
Ok I bought this camera about an hour before leaving on vacation. I had done a little research on this camera and and read lots of reviews with some negatives but mostly good to excellent reviews. Right out of the box this camera is ready to use and without charging the battery I was able to get over half a days worth of use filming and taking pictures before the battery needed to be charged. I had seen several people complain that it took to long for the picture to take saying (2-3) seconds, NOT TRUE this camera is as fast as any point and shoot that I have owned, even under water and in lower light conditions. The picture quality is amazing, I thought that there might be a little clarity issue with it as ... you are taking pictures underwater, that is not the case with this camera. The price is really cheap for a DURABLE point and shoot. Some people complained that its a little harder to operate and navigate, I am not a rocket scientist but this camera is as easy to use as any other point and shoot out there. It is so cool to freak people out when you stand there by the side of the pool and just jump or act like you fell in. I have had several people come ask me about this camera and I let them check it out and use it to see for them selves. I RECOMMEND THIS CAMERA FOR EVERY WATER PERSON AND ANYONE WHO HAS CHILDREN. expand » « collapse

Item.Item: Olympus µ[MJU:] TOUGH-8010 14 MP Digital Camera (Platinum silver)
Item.Review:
Pros: Nice Body Color; Good in Low Light; Great Zoom; Good Image Stabilization
Extremely happy with my product it looks good, the performance of the camera is great. I'm not a pro photographer but I like to take pics quite often such as landscapes when on holiday and this is a great camera for all those occasions whether you are on the beach or at a wedding reception. Records HD videos as well which is an added bonus. Easy to function. [...]

Item.Item: Olympus µ[MJU:] TOUGH-8010 14 MP Digital Camera (Platinum silver)
Item.Review:
Pros: Ease of Use; Nice looking; Quality construction
Cons: Complicated manual use
Have used it snorkeling and in pools, works great. I don't like the number of steps you have to go through for manual use of the camera.

Item.Item: Olympus µ[MJU:] TOUGH-8010 14 MP Digital Camera (Platinum silver)
Item.ReviewTitle: Great idea, Can't wait to try it!
Item.Review:
Pros: Large Clear LCD
Haven't used it yet as it is a gift for someone else (I will get to use it though!). Feels sturdy, but looks clunky (as expected). Refurbished as new, did not see any phycial damage.

Item.Item: Olympus µ[MJU:] TOUGH-8010 14 MP Digital Camera (Platinum silver)
Item.Review:
Pros: Easy to Use; Great Resolution; Large Clear LCD; Non Breakable
Cons: Lag / Shutter Delay; Slow Start Up
So far this camera has done most things I had in mind. I was scared to try it in the water the 1st time..., but not anymore. It works great with video too!

Item.Item: Olympus µ[MJU:] TOUGH-8010 14 MP Digital Camera (Platinum silver)
Item.Review:
Pros: Durable; Great quality; waterproof
Cons: Heavy
This is a great product. Used it on an extensive trip to Thailand recently. rained frequently - no problem. Snorkeling - no problem. Sightseeing in back of jeep - no problem. A dedicated SLR and high end P&S may have better optics, but they cannot go where this beauty goes. Clearly a specialty product. But if severe duty is what you need, this should be one of your choices. Highly recommended

Item.Item: Olympus µ[MJU:] TOUGH-8010 14 MP Digital Camera (Platinum silver)
Item.ReviewTitle: Great under water video and photos
Item.Review:
Pros: Large Clear LCD; Fast/accurate auto-focus; Good Image Quality; Small / Compact; Nice Body Color; Easy To Use
Cons: Lag / Shutter Delay; Limited Zoom
The most durable camera I have ever used. Great under water HD video.

Item.Item: Olympus µ[MJU:] TOUGH-8010 14 MP Digital Camera (Platinum silver)
Item.ReviewTitle: Noisy image, only good for BRIGHT scenes
Item.Review:
Pros: Manual panorama was good; Decent in BRIGHT daylight; Supposedly waterproof
Cons: Couldn't get sharp image; Terribly noisy image; Slow to focus
Tested it out and had very poor image quality in all but BRIGHT sunlight. Spent a lot of time trying different modes, etc. Medium light was always noisy. Zooming was VERY grainy and noisy in all situations except bright sunlight. Digital zoom was off. Camera was refurbished. Returned it.

Item.Item: Olympus µ[MJU:] TOUGH-8010 14 MP Digital Camera (Platinum silver)
Item.Review:
Pros: Good Image Quality; Nice Body Color; Fast/accurate auto-focus; Good Image Stabilization; Easy To Use; Short Lag Time; Small / Compact; Good in Low Light; Great Zoom; Large Clear LCD
LOVE this camera!! Takes great photos. Very durable. Not a large camera but wish it was a tad less bulky.

Item.Item: Olympus µ[MJU:] TOUGH-8010 14 MP Digital Camera (Platinum silver)
Item.ReviewTitle: love this camera & I'm going to purchase
Item.Review:
Pros: Small / Compact; Easy to Use; Great Zoom; Great Resolution; Good in Low Light; Large Clear LCD; Good Battery Life; Fast Shutter Speed
THIS IS A GREAT PRODUCT EVEN FOR BEGINNERS.

Item.Item: Olympus µ[MJU:] TOUGH-8010 14 MP Digital Camera (Platinum silver)
Item.Reviewer: excellent store and fast delivery. Very
Item.ReviewTitle: excellent store and fast delivery. Very
Item.Review:
Pros: Fast Shutter Speed; Good Battery Life; Easy to Use; Small / Compact; Great Resolution; Good in Low Light; Great Zoom; Large Clear LCD
excellent store and fast delivery. Very satisfied and will buy again from them.

Item.Item: Olympus µ[MJU:] TOUGH-8010 14 MP Digital Camera (Platinum silver)
Item.Review:
Pros: Great Resolution; Good Battery Life; Great Zoom; Small / Compact; Large Clear LCD; Good in Low Light; Easy to Use
The only problem I find with this camera is the delay between pictures. Other than that I love this camera

Item.Item: Olympus µ[MJU:] TOUGH-8010 14 MP Digital Camera (Platinum silver)
Item.Review:
Pros: Rugged....Waterproof
Cons: Battery Life
I bought this camera before I went on vacation; I knew we were going to be on the go for several days and had a lot of different adventures lined up. So far, this camera has made it through 2 river intertubing trips that lasted about 4 hours each and 2 days of 4-wheeler ridding through rough terrain and VERY muddy trails. The picture quality is excellent and I haven't had any problems or issues with anything freezing up or not working. I do recommend using the float strap if you're going to be using this camera in or around the water.

Item.Item: Olympus µ[MJU:] TOUGH-8010 14 MP Digital Camera (Platinum silver)
Item.Review:
Pros: Good Battery Life; Easy to Use; Large Clear LCD; Small / Compact
Cons: No Viewfinder; Lag / Shutter Delay; Limited Zoom
Bought this waterproof camera for kayak trips. Also purchased the wrist float attachment so the camera doesn't go to the bottom of the creek.

Item.Item: Olympus µ[MJU:] TOUGH-8010 14 MP Digital Camera (Platinum silver)
Item.Review:
Pros: Easy to Use; Good Battery Life; Large Clear LCD; Small / Compact; Great Zoom; Great Resolution; Good in Low Light
Cons: Lag / Shutter Delay
This camera is so well protected against abuse at 14 megapixels I can only marvel at its low price. We lost our last 3 camera's due to falls onto hard surfaces and water damage. Though I cannot predict the future I highly suspect that we won't be looking for another camera should any of these mishaps occur again. Shutter speed could be better but this is the only trade-off I can see. For me, the Olympus Stylus Though 8010 is definitely the way to go.

Item.Item: Olympus µ[MJU:] TOUGH-8010 14 MP Digital Camera (Platinum silver)
Item.Review:
Pros: Everything
Cons: Nothing.. So far haha!
Okay, I dont know why this camera does not have the full five stars in the Best Buy customer reviews. It is the most amazing camera I have ever owned! I have bought thousands and thousands of dollars worth of gadgets at best buy and this one is the first one I've actually reviewed.

Item.Item: Olympus µ[MJU:] TOUGH-8010 14 MP Digital Camera (Platinum silver)
Item.Review:
Pros: Upgrades from earlier models are amazing! Safety Lock so no water gets in and HD video!
Cons: A little bit bigger than the earlier versions, but so far I love it!
So far I have nothing but great things to say!!!!!

Item.Item: Olympus µ[MJU:] TOUGH-8010 14 MP Digital Camera (Platinum silver)
Item.Review:
Pros: Durable and can be used ANYWHERE!!
Cons: Mine was stolen before I got to a "not so great!"
I love this camera (and it's predecessor) for it's underwater feature. It is so durable and can handle being bounced around in a fairly rough manner. If you like hanging at the lake, beach or even the swimming pool, this is a great camera to catch the moments you would usually miss because someone might splash you! Great with little kids because it can handle being dropped!

Item.Item: Olympus µ[MJU:] TOUGH-8010 14 MP Digital Camera (Platinum silver)
Item.Review:
Pros: Great Resolution; Good Battery Life; Large Clear LCD; Easy to Use; Good in Low Light
Cons: Occasional shutter delay; Slow to turn on
Just came back from a white-water rafting and ice-mountain climbing trip in Northern California. This camera stood up to it all. Great, clear, crisp photos. It was knocked around and covered in snow and water at times and still worked without a hitch. EXCELLENT PRODUCT!!!

Item.Item: Olympus µ[MJU:] TOUGH-8010 14 MP Digital Camera (Platinum silver)
Item.Review:
Pros: Durable & easy for me to use. I only have use of 1 arm
Cons: Don't know yet. Battery/card door is hard for me to open.
Seems to be a great camera, as all of my Olympus cameras have been.

Item.Item: Olympus µ[MJU:] TOUGH-8010 14 MP Digital Camera (Platinum silver)
Item.Review:
Pros: Great Zoom; Nice Body Color; Good Image Quality; Good in Low Light; Small / Compact; Easy To Use
Cons: Lag / Shutter Delay; Short Battery Life
i used this for family videos and school plays.

Item.Item: Olympus µ[MJU:] TOUGH-8010 14 MP Digital Camera (Platinum silver)
Item.ReviewTitle: I would by this product again.
Item.Review:
Pros: Fabulous price; Speedy delivery; Repeat Customer for sure
This is a fabulous camera, i bought this for my wife and she has a bracket on her motorcycle that the camera is attached to and we don't have to worry about the rain.

Item.Item: Olympus µ[MJU:] TOUGH-8010 14 MP Digital Camera (Platinum silver)
Item.Review:
Pros: Good in Low Light; Good Image Stabilization; Good Image Quality; Short Lag Time; Nice Body Color; Small / Compact; Great Zoom
Cons: Short Battery Life
I am a pro photographer, my wife is not. she has done everything to kill a normal camera, but it is working.i bought it for her, she is not permitted to use my equipment. The only down fall to this product is you must go on line to down load good instructions from Olympus.

Item.Item: Olympus µ[MJU:] TOUGH-8010 14 MP Digital Camera (Platinum silver)
Item.Review:
Pros: Internal manual and help; Can edit images in camera; Good look and feel; 2gb internal capacity
Cons: 3 images panoramic photo; The beatuy mode uses 8MPX; Little bit heavy; Not good face detection; Sftwr not working W7 64
Best use for taking pictures in extreme conditions, not to be worried of the weather or water.
Can't wait to take it underwater LOL

Item.Item: Olympus µ[MJU:] TOUGH-8010 14 MP Digital Camera (Platinum silver)
Item.ReviewTitle: I would buy this product again
Item.Review:
Pros: Easy to Use; Small / Compact; Good Battery Life; Great Resolution; Good in Low Light; Large Clear LCD; Great Zoom
Cons: Lag / Shutter Delay
outdoors near water

Item.Item: Olympus µ[MJU:] TOUGH-8010 14 MP Digital Camera (Platinum silver)
Item.Review:
Pros: Great Zoom; Great Resolution; Good Battery Life; Small / Compact; Easy to Use
Cons: No Viewfinder; Limited Zoom
[...].No problems, worked straight from the box

Item.Item: Olympus µ[MJU:] TOUGH-8010 14 MP Digital Camera (Platinum silver)
Item.Review:
Pros: Easy to Use; Great Resolution; Small / Compact; Large Clear LCD; Good Battery Life
Cons: Limited Zoom; Lag / Shutter Delay; Poor in Low Light; Can't shoot in RAW; No Viewfinder
I bought this in light of getting a water housing for one of my other cameras to take on a cruise I just got back from... And this is a whole lot lighter than any of my other cameras... It worked but I really missed the ability to shoot in RAW and the low light abilities were very wanting...

Item.Item: Olympus µ[MJU:] TOUGH-8010 14 MP Digital Camera (Platinum silver)
Item.Review:
Pros: Good Image Quality; Good Image Stabilization; Fast/accurate auto-focus; Easy To Use; Good in Low Light
Just went white water rafting for 9 days in the Grand Canyon. Camera worked great in and out of the water!

Item.Item: Olympus µ[MJU:] TOUGH-8010 14 MP Digital Camera (Platinum silver)
Item.Review:
Pros: Easy To Use; Fast/accurate auto-focus; Good Image Quality; Small / Compact
I was working in Costa Rica and destroyed 2 cameras I got this one because it was water proff and could take a beating. it has been a great camera it has gone rafting, scub diving (50 feet) ATV and all other types of events.

Item.Item: Olympus µ[MJU:] TOUGH-8010 14 MP Digital Camera (Platinum silver)
Item.Review:
Cons: Camera didn't work
Was very frustrated to buy a new camera and then it didn't work, had to deal with sending in to the manufacturer and it wasn't fixed in time for my month long vacation which was one of the main reasons I bought it.

Item.Item: Olympus µ[MJU:] TOUGH-8010 14 MP Digital Camera (Platinum silver)
Item.Review:
Pros: Easy to use when it works
Camera worked for about 10 pictures under water (only about 8-10 feet under watrer), then just stopped when I tried to record video. I checked to make sure the water seal was locked and it was. Disappointing to have a new camera on vacation that doesn't work. I will be returning it to BuyDig.

Item.Item: Olympus µ[MJU:] TOUGH-8010 14 MP Digital Camera (Platinum silver)
Item.Review:
Cons: poor zoom and slow speed
The camera is slow to operate, the zoom is not very good. i would go with another camera for quick shots out of water and either a case for that camera to take it underwater or spend the extra money and get a more advanced underwater camera.

Item.Item: Olympus µ[MJU:] TOUGH-8010 14 MP Digital Camera (Platinum silver)
Item.Review:
Pros: underwater to 30 ft
Cons: battery charging system
We take this camera everywhere .We use it for snorkling ,sailing and for general picture taking .I have had allot of good input fromOlympus with the email support

Item.Item: Olympus µ[MJU:] TOUGH-8010 14 MP Digital Camera (Platinum silver)
Item.Review:
Pros: relaible
Cons: not the most stylish
perfect for people that are active and use their camera in outside and potentially difficult scenarios. Rough and tumble camera for rough and tumble people

Item.Item: Olympus µ[MJU:] TOUGH-8010 14 MP Digital Camera (Platinum silver)
Item.ReviewTitle: Great camera for someone who breaks everything
Item.Review:
Pros: Water and distruction proof, lots of features, good picture
Cons: Short battery life, fairly pricey
I bought this camera because we were going on a cruise and I wanted something to take underwater pictures. I went with the 8010 because it is crush proof and fall proof and I have a tendency to break electronics easily. I bought the militarized Casio Rock from Verizon and had it broken in 3 weeks. However I have had this camera for over a month now and I have yet to break it, in fact it still looks brand new. It seems to take very good underwater pictures and has yet to leak. I even caught my girlfriends 12 year old brother jumping on it in the living room the other day because he "wanted to test the crush proof." Obviously I was not happy but still not a scratch and he e ... ven left the battery door open while jumping on it. The only complaints I have is that the shutter got some crushed beach shells stuck in it and it took 20 minutes and a staple to get it working again. And the battery is fairly short lived. It is fine for most but if you plan on taking tons of pictures and leaving it on a lot I would buy the extra battery. expand » « collapse

Item.Item: Olympus µ[MJU:] TOUGH-8010 14 MP Digital Camera (Platinum silver)
Item.Review:
Pros: Outdoor use , Waterproof . Picture quality , Video Quality ETC
Cons: Low light conditions quality ,Lens needs better protection against water,Shine Blue plate on the front gets scratch
Show pictures was taken from the plane between 6000 and 7000 FT altitude I got a 770 which get broken so I did upgrade to the newest model 8010
I got the cam 1 day before going vacation and the first picture I took was a Ship on the middle of the ocean , picture was took at 7000 ft altitude and now I transfer it to the PC I can even see the ship details when zoomed without loosing quality ... WOW Camera is great .... Double lock is a must .... Super good quality ( for a small point and shot cam) Relative easy to use . It took me 10 min to realize how every thing works but ... remember I have a old model before ...
Only negative points I see so far
- In Low light conditions quality is not the best I have seen . But it is fair - Some time you need to take time to adjust the cam for better quality cause even the auto mode won't get focus ( it happens with most cams) - Lens needs better protection against water ( remember to clean lens before take picture when using camera on the water ) -Shine Blue plate on the front is nice but gets scratch very easy expand » « collapse

Item.Item: Olympus µ[MJU:] TOUGH-8010 14 MP Digital Camera (Platinum silver)
Item.Review:
Pros: Large Clear LCD; Good Battery Life; Great Resolution; Fast Shutter Speed; Great Zoom; Small / Compact; Easy to Use; Good in Low Light
Cons: Terrible software
The camera is incredible, I have only bought this type of model, this is the newest in the line and I must say I do not worry about them being damaged, they resist dust, get smacked across steel and keep on clicking, not to mention, water and being dropped over 50 feet. Great camera, never be afraid of it, its as tough as tough can be and takes amazing photo's. One down fall is the soft ware for editing, terrible, why they hcnage dit is beyond me.

Item.Item: Olympus µ[MJU:] TOUGH-8010 14 MP Digital Camera (Platinum silver)
Item.Review:
Pros: Large Clear LCD; Good Battery Life; Great Zoom; Good in Low Light; Fast Shutter Speed; Small / Compact; Great Resolution; Easy to Use
Used for underwater pics in the Honduras. Great quality and easy to use. This is a great little camera.

Item.Item: Olympus µ[MJU:] TOUGH-8010 14 MP Digital Camera (Platinum silver)
Item.Review:
Pros: Good image quality
Cons: Manual is not so good
I really like this camera, but have not gone underwater with it yet. It appears thAt before you do you need to clean the door area w alcohol so it will seal good. Great photo quality. The manual doesn't explain the features very well. Not a good camera for beginners.

Item.Item: Olympus µ[MJU:] TOUGH-8010 14 MP Digital Camera (Platinum silver)
